attributes.action: Stop delaying and leave the EU on WTO terms.
attributes.additional_details: The EU have show complete disregard for the vote of the British people, they have disrespected the UK prime minister and the British people as a whole time and time again, they have been totally unwilling to come to a fair deal for both the UK and Europe as a whole. Time to show the EU who the UK people really are, we are the ones that when we had our backs against the wall and a dictator at our door gave our lives and souls to free Europe from tyranny. We deserve to be treated with respect.
attributes.background:
Complete the promise to the British people, David Cameron gave us a very simple choice stay in the EU or leave the EU that was the simple choice. 
Time and time again this promise has been broken remove us from the EU on the 29th of March under WTO terms.
